headline: 87% of Organizations Are Running Software With Known, Exploitable Vulnerabilities, Datadog Finds
summary: The State of DevSecOps Report 2026 highlights a broader industry shift as security risk increasingly moves upstream into the software supply chainNEW YORK, Feb. 26, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ: DDOG), the AI-powered observability and security platform for cloud applications, today released its latest State of DevSecOps Report, finding that nearly nine in 10 organizations (87%) have at least one known exploitable vulnerability in deployed services. The report points to a broade
